text:
ADO-EKITI | March 24, 2021

Today, I received my first jab of the #AstraZeneca #COVID19 #vaccine.
#vaccination is one of the numerous steps taken by the @ekitistategov in ensuring #citizens are protected from the virus, adding to other safety protocols.
#StaySafe #StaySafeNigeria https://t.co/wj713TQegZ
